Metadata.Title: Using TEAM Mentor Fortify SCA UI Integration
Metadata.DirectLink: Using TEAM Mentor Fortify SCA UI Integration

Content.Data:
To make use of TEAM Mentor integrated guidance simply Scan a project. You will see TEAM Mentor Guidance in the “Custom Explanation” field in the Details tab and “Custom Recommendation” field in the Recommendation tab.
{{/Image/ftusn1.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
{{/Image/ftusn2.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
